entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.3°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
